content: tips - mix some catnip into your stuffing in a ziploc so it s ready to go to store i put this inside another bag and then locked in a drawer because my cats will shred it around the house if they find it - never mind stitch markers they take longer if time is a worry for you you really can t get too far off on something so little when you finish round 6 pull your beginning tail through to mark where the row end before beginning the even rounds -before stuffing turn you fish wrong-side out split and tie the beginning tail a couple of times right against the fabric this should help keep the stuffing from busting out from the nose later and is a lot faster than sewing the end stitches used magic_ring magic_ring or circle <or> ch2 and work into 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet single_crochet blo back loop only slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet fo finish off cut yarn 5-minute fish by jenna wingate pattern usage please do not use this pattern for personal gain the 5-minute mouse pattern from several years make tons of them for your cats your friends cats back has proven very popular among crocheting your sister s cats the shelter just don t make them cat people in honor of bunny the new kitten i to sell or sell the pattern or use the pictures the have designed a new toy based on that pattern it exception to that would be shelter fund-raisers in has been amusing to see how many people took which case i would greatly appreciate you asking the name 5-minute mouse as a challenge or first i will be happy to help you spread the word judgment on their crocheting speed it was never about the event thanks so much for your honesty meant literally and was only intended to relay and for loving the kitties quick and easy since the controversy over that little number doesn t seem like it will end i did it again and no i cannot make this fish in 5 minutes it takes more like 10 but who really cares because what you get in the end is a great and easy cat toy skill level easy finished size 2 5 inches long + tail gauge unimportant american crochet terms materials #4 weight medium/worsted yarn scraps f/5 3 75mm crochet hook stuffing optional catnip bell use with caution find me - website ravelry etsy fb email crinkles business envelope window have questions email only please 5-minute fish for pattern assistance email only please © 2015 jenna wingate designs pattern worked in continuous rounds do not join do not turn 1 in a magic_ring make 6sc pull ring tail to close tightly 6 crochet blo for the following rounds 2-9 2 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 3 times 9 3 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 2 3 times 12 4 2sc
